sentences.en: A translator shouldn't intrude his own opinions into what he's translating.
sentences.cn: 译者不应该擅自把自己的意思加进译文中。

sentences.en: He was placed in Xin Hua News Agency as a translator.
sentences.cn: 他被安排在新华通讯社当翻译.

sentences.en: Her love of languages inclined her towards a career as a translator.
sentences.cn: 她对语言的热爱使她倾向于从事翻译工作.

sentences.en: His love of languages inclined him towards a career as a translator.
sentences.cn: 他对语言的热爱促使他从事翻译工作.

sentences.en: I think the translator missed some of the subtleties of the original.
sentences.cn: 我认为译者漏掉了原著中一些微妙之处.

sentences.en: PL is usually imbedded is a translator writing system.
sentences.cn: 我们通常把PL嵌在编写翻译程序的系统中.

sentences.en: She was aas a translator, she turned it down.
sentences.cn: 有人请她去作翻译, 她拒绝了.

sentences.en: She works as a translator of technical texts.
The author discovered that the translator had foisted several passages into his book.
sentences.cn: 作者发现译者偷偷在他的原著中插入了几段.

sentences.en: The pre - eminent translator of the Spanish language has never been to Spain.
sentences.cn: 这位出色的西班牙语翻译家却从没到过西班牙.

sentences.en: The translator has done a good job of rendering this difficult poem into his native language.
sentences.cn: 把这首非常难懂的诗歌译成本国语言,译者做了一件大好事.

sentences.en: The WML translator delivers existing WML ( WAP ) applications to non - WML devices.
sentences.cn: WML转换器将现有WML ( WAP ) 应用程序送到 非 WML设备.

sentences.en: To work as a translator, you need fluency in at least one foreign language.
sentences.cn: 想当一名翻译的话，你至少需要熟练掌握一门外语。

sentences.en: Tung now departed from the role of translator to agree with his General.
sentences.cn: 董现在越出了他的翻译的职责,来表示赞同司令员的意见.

sentences.en: We do not know why the translator made that mistake.
sentences.cn: 我们不知道那名翻译员为何会犯下这个错误.

words.tran_cn: 可译的；能译的；可转移的
翻译；转化；解释；转变为；调动

trans.tran_en: someone who changes writing into a different language
